name: Subliminal Demo Windows ZIP Install
description:
Welcome to Subliminal! 
Subliminal is a Single Player RPG that takes elements from Runescape, Skyrim, Animal Crossing, Pokemon and Harvest Moon.  The game is in an early access state but still has 16 trainable skills that have unlockable rewards per level, depending on the skill, multiple levelled crafting systems like Smithing, Cooking and Crafting, these work incredibly similar to the way Old School Runescape used to run. The game will have a heavy influence on monster hunting and pet collecting, skill grinding, dungeon and world exploring, questing, planning armour and weapon type set ups and customising houses and farms. Most of this is currently already available, with work to increase this exponentially already in progress. 113 collectable pet followers are fully programmed into the game and all make use of the Pet Kennel System, however in the Demo only the Rabbit and Sparrow pets are obtainable.  - DeadFissure
